title: Frost armor
summaries: The Frost armor is a Hardmode armor set that grants the ability to inflict Frostbite / Frostburn on enemies with melee or ranged attacks when the whole set is worn, as well as causing all ranged and melee attacks to give off light. Frostbite is a variant of the Frostburn debuff that deals 25 DPS instead of 8.

On the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version, the Ice Golem will drop a Frost Core, required to craft one piece of Frost armor. On the Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, Ice Golems will drop a random piece of Frost armor.

Visually, wearing the set causes a "snow trail" to be left behind the player as they walk, similar to running with Hermes Boots. Also, the sound when player takes damage is replaced with the shattering sound heard when breaking through Thin Ice.
The Desert's Forbidden armor is the counterpart to this armor set, buffing magic and summon abilities instead of melee and ranged.
It takes 46 Adamantite or Titanium Bars (Hallowed in the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version) as well as 3 Frost Cores to craft a full set of Frost armor.
A full set of Frost armor will provide the following benefits:

• Ranged and melee attacks cause Frostbite / Frostburn
  • +43 defense
  • +26% melee and ranged damage
  • +16% melee and ranged damage
  • +11% melee and ranged critical strike chance
  • +8% movement speed
  • +10% melee speed
